name: Puzzle Bonsai (itch)
description:
Puzzle Bonsai is a relaxing puzzle game where you combine parts of the puzzle tree to form different types of equations.

Puzzle Bonsai was originally released on iOS in 2012 and is no longer available there. I now (2021) decided to fix the PC build and upload it here for free so it doesn't completely disappear into the void. Might be a bit klunky but it should be playable.
